solution_line_template: Brayden and Gavin scored {brayden_gavin_touchdowns} touchdowns * {points_per_touchdown} points each = <<{brayden_gavin_touchdowns}*{points_per_touchdown}={brayden_gavin_points}>>{brayden_gavin_points} points.
Cole and Freddy scored {cole_freddy_touchdowns} touchdowns * {points_per_touchdown} points each = <<{cole_freddy_touchdowns}*{points_per_touchdown}={cole_freddy_points}>>{cole_freddy_points} points.

Cole and Freddy's team had {cole_freddy_points} - {brayden_gavin_points} points = <<{cole_freddy_points}-{brayden_gavin_points}={point_difference}>>{point_difference} points more than Brayden and Gavin's team.
